name: The Blue Menace
description:
The Blue Menace is a game that was made within 24 hours, in the smallest file size. 

This game requires you to have installed Python with the Pygame and arcade libraries. Please read the "READ THIS FIRST" text file included inside of the game for more details. 

The game revolves around beating levels as fast as possible, and there are plenty of ways to do so, be careful not to fall into pits in the later stages, and have fun!

If you die in the game, you have to restart the entire game, we apologize for any inconvenience. 

This game was created by: Elia Poncia, Kashyap Bendapudi, and Giulio Poncia. 

Kashyap Bendapudi (Indian Jesus) - Team Leader, Programmer, Composer, and Artist
Giulio Poncia (Concerned Bear) - Programmer and Artist, and SFX
Elia Poncia (M.A.G.E) - Level Designer and Programmer
